courses.title: Introduction to Scratch
courses.description: A fun way for kids to learn programming by creating interactive stories and games.

courses.title: Python for Kids
courses.description: Learn the basics of programming using Python, focusing on simple projects and fun exercises.

courses.title: Building Simple Games
courses.description: Teach kids how to create simple games using programming concepts and logic.

courses.title: Web Development for Beginners
courses.description: Teach kids the basics of HTML and CSS to create their own simple websites.

courses.title: Game Development with Unity
courses.description: A beginner-friendly course that introduces kids to game development using the Unity engine.

courses.title: Python Game Programming
courses.description: Learn how to create simple games using Python, focusing on game design and coding logic.

courses.title: JavaScript for Beginners
courses.description: An introduction to JavaScript, teaching kids how to make web pages interactive and dynamic.

courses.title: Introduction to Java
courses.description: A foundational course in Java programming, covering object-oriented concepts and simple applications.

courses.title: Mobile App Development
courses.description: Teach kids how to create simple mobile applications using platforms like MIT App Inventor.

courses.title: Advanced Python Programming
courses.description: Dive deeper into Python with advanced topics, including data structures and algorithms, suitable for teens.

courses.title: Full Stack Web Development
courses.description: A comprehensive course covering both front-end and back-end development, preparing teens for web development careers.

courses.title: Robotics Programming with Arduino
courses.description: Learn how to program and build robots using Arduino, combining hardware and software skills.
